sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "./common/Header"; import Footer from "./common/Footer"; import ScriptTag from "react-script-tag"; import AOS from "aos"; let ref_url = localStorage["refState"] ? JSON.parse(localStorage["refState"]).refURL : ""; // console.log(ref_url); export default class Home extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); AOS.init(); } componentWillReceiveProps() { AOS.refresh(); } render() { return (

About the Club

Brief History

Founded on the 1st of August 2015 by Ambasador Sonnia Agu, a Nigerian humanitarian and Social Entrepreneur. The idea is to create a society that is non-political and free from all racial or religious distinctions, ready for the next revolution which is that of the mind. There have been different kinds of revolution, and Africans sadly missed it. hence the creation of The Sapio Club to help connect, empower and prepare great minds for the next global revolution of the Mind. The sapio society welcomes people from every walk of life whose mind, passion and IQ is in the top 2% of the population, with the objective of enjoying each other's company, supporting community development, growing clientele, Network and participating in a wide range of social and cultural activities.

What does "Sapio" mean?

The word "Sapio" means "Wise/Intelligence" in Latin. The word Sapio is from Latin root sapiens, which means wise or intelligent, and Latin word sexualis/sexual, relating to the sexes (male /female) I.e.: - intelligent/wise Fe (Male) Being sapiosexual simply put is one who finds intelligence the most attractive feature in a person. The Sapiosexual Community is an intelligence loving society, where race, gender, color, creed, national origin, age, politics, educational or social background are irrelevant.

Vision

To become the desiderata for our generation and beyond through a conglomerate collaboration of “The African Intelligence”.

Our Goals

To identify and foster human intelligence for the benefit of humanity

To encourage research in the nature, characteristics and uses of intelligence

To promote stimulating intellectual and social opportunities for its members

To support, promote, and prepare Africans both home and diaspora towards the UN 2063 United Africa goal

Our Success Story

Since inception, the Sapiosexual Club has grown in bounds and has membership strength of over 10,000 young professionals. Our mentoring program has birthed a vibrant community of high achieving entrepreneurs, civil society leaders and public servants who are unrepentantly committed to taking bold actions that create career and national success. Moreover, our work has helped to restore civic hope and reduce political apathy by creating a new breed of politically conscious individuals.

The success we have recorded so far therefore emboldens us to expand our reach and create a bigger platform that works round the clock to continue inspiring the leaders of today while preparing the leaders of tomorrow for the task of national development that rests on their shoulders.

Our overarching goal is to provide an eclectic, active and vibrant platform for young, detribalized, knowledgeable and emerging African leaders to network, share ideas and engage productively in civic activities to chart the course for a new Africa placed on a pedestal for sustainable growth and development.

Club Justification: Like former US President, John F. Kennedy quipped in his mentally stimulating and thought-provoking inaugural address, “Ask not what your country can do for you, ask what you can do for your country” it’s in that same vein that we decided to rally Africa’s youthful intellectuals to form a common front towards finding, proposing, and when possible, implementing enduring solutions to combat the hydra-headed socio-political and economic challenges bedevilling Africa and the global sphere with fierce urgency.

The Sapiosexual Club is set to engage by convening club (E) / physical meetings, workshops, mentorship sessions, civic education/public enlightenment, webinars, programs , cultural and language exchange and knowledge sharing circles and so.

The importance of forging a common front and finding workable solutions to the developmental challenges in Africa cannot be overemphasized. With a population of over 1.3 Billion people, making Africas population equivalent to 16.72% of the total world population, The Sapio Community have no doubt that Africa is at a break or make moment.

Without mincing words, if the socioeconomic challenges facing Africa is not tackled with fierce urgency, the social and political fiber holding the continent together is sure to be ripped apart.

It is therefore in a bid to turn Africa around positively that the Sapio Club seeks to create a formidable front of eclectic and knowledgeable African citizens that will find and execute home grown solutions that will solve Africa’s wicked problems, give Africans a better life and assure the development of Africa’s influence to socioeconomic development.

Our 8 Point Principal Objectives

To establish the principles of good governance and citizenship, bridging the gap between citizens and state.

Take active interest in the civic, social and moral welfare of the community

Encourage social innovation and entrepreneurship.

Position to Be the first point of contact for FDI’s (Foreign direct investors)

Inspire innovations across our Cultures and generations

Introduce the importance of intellectual entertainment – Arts, Music, Film, Comedy for the enhancement and growth of the new African mind.

Encourage good neighbourliness amongst citizens of the New Africa both home and diaspora.

Expose Africa’s transformational initiatives to the world.

Our Pledge

I pledge to be patriotic, to add substantial value to the Sapio club, my country and the world at large. I Promise to live in Love, Unity and Peace at all times whether home or diaspora.

I must finish the race in good faith wherever I may find my self, (Once a Sapio Citizen, Always a Sapio Citizen).

I promise to represent my self, other Africans and what we stand for in a very positive manner as I state to have my membership revoked if my word doesn’t become my bond and I am found doing otherwise.

I promise not to get involved in anything that brings violence.

I will not shy away from duties.

I will be willing to serve and render my supports when need be.

I am obliged to encourage peace and harmony, to desist from any act that might lead to strive, rivalry or violence amongst others.

So help me God!

Become a
Member!

Join the community of Intellectuals.

Join Now
{/*/main*/}
{/* Template Main JS File */} ); } }
